Apos.​Input.​MouseCondition
Apos.​Input.​ICondition
public
Apos.​Input.​MouseCondition

Checks various conditions on a specific mouse button.  Non static methods implicitly make sure that the game is active. Otherwise returns false.

Constructors
MouseCondition
public MouseCondition(
MouseButton button
)
Parameter
button
MouseButton

The button to operate on.

Public Functions
Pressed
public bool Pressed()
Returns

Returns true when the button was not pressed and is now pressed.

Held
public bool Held()
Returns

Returns true when the button is now pressed.

HeldOnly
public bool HeldOnly()
Returns

Returns true when the button was pressed and is now pressed.

Released
public bool Released()
Returns

Returns true when the button was pressed and is now not pressed.

MouseButton button
)

IsMouseValid
public static bool IsMouseValid(
bool IsActive
)
Returns

Returns true when the mouse is within the game window.
